title: PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working - HELP
body: I can't even open the client to repair it... Suggestions? Please help!

replies.body: The same thing is happening to me, except it's been occurring the whole day. Is this happening to anyone else?
its happening to me as well, I left my laptop with league open when I fell asleep then the next day I tried reopening it to see it the PVP.net patcher kernel error

Patcher Kernel errors are usually something that happens when League is missing crucial system permissions to run. Because League interacts with files outside of the League installation folder, it requires specific administrative privileges to run correctly. I recommend working through the steps inside of our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as a first step in resolving this.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.
